metadata.feature_description: Add, edit, delete and moderate comments on wiki articles

steps.expected: Wiki module with articles should be visible
steps.actual: Wiki Test page shows empty in view mode - modules only visible in Edit mode

steps.action: Enter Edit mode to see Wiki module with articles
steps.expected: Wiki module shows list of articles
steps.actual: Wiki module in LeftPane shows 4 articles in edit mode

steps.action: Click on article link to view article detail with comments
steps.expected: Article detail page should display article content and comments section
steps.actual: Article detail page is completely empty - no Wiki module configured on article child pages

steps.action: Try Edit mode on article detail page
steps.expected: Page should show pane placeholders to add modules
steps.actual: Article detail page shows empty even in edit mode - no pane placeholders visible

issues: Wiki article detail pages (e.g., /Wiki-Test/Test-Article-for-Bookmarks) are completely empty
No Wiki Article module is configured on the article child pages
Comments section cannot be accessed because article content does not render
This is a configuration issue with the Wiki Test page setup - article detail view is not properly configured

steps.action: Navigate to article to post a comment
steps.expected: Article page with comments section should be accessible
steps.actual: Cannot access comments section - article detail pages are empty

issues: Cannot test posting comments because the article detail page with comments section is not accessible

steps.action: Navigate to article to edit a comment
steps.expected: Article page with existing comments should be accessible
steps.actual: Cannot access comments section - article detail pages are empty

issues: Cannot test editing comments because the article detail page with comments section is not accessible

steps.action: Navigate to article to delete a comment
steps.expected: Article page with existing comments should be accessible
steps.actual: Cannot access comments section - article detail pages are empty

issues: Cannot test deleting comments because the article detail page with comments section is not accessible

steps.action: Navigate to article to reply to a comment
steps.expected: Article page with existing comments should be accessible
steps.actual: Cannot access comments section - article detail pages are empty

issues: Cannot test replying to comments because the article detail page with comments section is not accessible

steps.action: Navigate to article to test empty comment validation
steps.expected: Article page with comment input should be accessible
steps.actual: Cannot access comments section - article detail pages are empty

issues: Cannot test empty comment validation because the article detail page with comments section is not accessible

observations: Code review confirms comments functionality exists in SocialController.cs with PostComment(), UpdateComment(), ApproveComment(), and DeleteComment() methods
Comments require the article to be approved and have comments enabled in module settings
Notification system for comments is implemented in Notifications.cs (NewCommentNotifications, SendCommentAwaitingApprovalNotifications)
User received notification about 'Edit own comments' privilege, confirming the comments system is active
The Wiki module on the Wiki Test page shows articles in list view but article detail pages have no Wiki Article module configured to display content and comments
This appears to be a Wiki Test page configuration issue rather than a code bug - the article child pages need to have a Wiki Article module added to display content and comments
The Wiki list view shows article summaries but does not include inline comments functionality
